CustomField.description: Should be checked when the addresses for Account and Primary Partner are validated. Used to not allow the opportunity to move to the final quote without the addresses being validated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Make sure you verify the customer and partner (if applicable) addresses. Check this box when done. You can't generate the final quote until you verify. If sold directly, set both shipping and billing addresses on the account. If sold via a partner, set the shipping address for the end-user on the account, and billing address on the partner (since we will be charging them).
CustomField.label: Addresses Validated?
